className.description: The class name. Used widely on the admin panel. Default: class name.

nameSingular.description: The singular lowercase name of your entity. Used widely on the admin panel. Default: singular lowercase name.

namePlural.description: The plural lowercase name of your entity. Used widely on the admin panel. Default: plural lowercase name.

slug.description: The kebab-case slug of the entity that will define API endpoints. Default: plural dasherized name.

mainProp.description: The main prop of the entity. Used widely on the admin panel. Default: first string field.

seedCount.description: The number of entities to seed when running the seed command. Default: 50.

properties.description: The properties of the entity. Doc: https://docs.case.app/properties

hasMany.description: The hasMany relationships of the entity. Doc: https://docs.case.app/relationships

belongsTo.description: The belongsTo relationships of the entity. Doc: https://docs.case.app/relationships
